resources.string: Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map.

This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Tracker\'.
Location permission is required for this app.
Enter the name and Pin of the person you want to track. A notification will be send to the person you add, saying you will be tracking them.
There\'s no data available for this user. Maybe he has not used the app yet!
